question: Dehang-Dibang Biosphere Reserve is located in which of the following places?
explanation: Dehang-Dibang Biosphere Reserve is located in Arunachal Pradesh. It also includes part of Siang and Dibang Valley in Arunachal Pradesh. It was constituted in 1998. It covers high mountains of Eastern Himalaya and Mishmi Hills of Arunachal Pradesh.
